gimmethatgimmick.itemGroup.name: Gimme That Gimmick
item.gimme-that-gimmick.abomasite.toolti: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Abomasnow hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.gimme-that-gimmick.absolite.tooltip: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Absol hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.gimme-that-gimmick.adamantorb.toolt: Boosts Steel- and Dragon-type attacks of Dialga
item.gimme-that-gimmick.aerodactylite.to: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Aerodactyl hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.gimme-that-gimmick.aggronite.toolti: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Aggron hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.gimme-that-gimmick.alakazite.toolti: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Alakazam hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
item.gimme-that-gimmick.aloraichiumz.too: This is a crystallized form of Z-Power.
It upgrades Alolan Raichu's Thunderbolt to a Z-Move.
item.gimme-that-gimmick.altarianite.tool: One of a variety of mysterious Mega Stones.
Have Altaria hold it, and this stone will enable it to Mega Evolve during battle.
